response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's not just an item; it's an investment that has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. Given its value to us, we're offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to reflect its immense worth while ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. We believe in creating long-term partnerships and trust that this product will contribute positively to your endeavors. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
